description: Them Bokoblins, they only fight for the strong! When we Moblins show them who's stongest and who's best, that makes em want to fight for us more!
tooltip: Them Bokoblins, they only fight for the strong! When we Moblins show them who's stongest and who's best, that makes em want to fight for us more! (Bokoblins training time now twice as fast)
